Step 1:- Save maximum Five contact numbers of Five relatives.

Step 2:- The app will send SMS with your live location to all five numbers.The live location will be a link also it will be longitude, latitude and the exact place wherever you are present, so that your relatives could take action even if they don't have internet connection.

Step 3:- Now, This app is ready to help you in emergency situations.


Let's see how you will use I'm Safe in emergency:-

Step 1:- Whenever you go through any unsafe place, just shake your device for 3 times so that the app starts running in the background.

Step 2:-Make Sure that all these 3 times shaking should be in one minute otherwise you will have to again start shaking count from zero.

Step 3:-Whenever you feel emergency, tapping power button three times will start a siren alarm to deviate the culprit.

Step 4:- Tapping power button again three times will stop the siren.

Note:- Make sure that tapping power button means screen goes off or on
